thread.title: Predator the heat of the jungle v0.3 (RELEASED)

post.author: Hostyle
post.body:
Download Predator the heat of the jungle v0.3 for Crysis v1.2


A small group of commandos, on a mission in a Central American jungle, are sent by the CIA to rescue captured airmen from Guerillas. But it's not the armed terrorists which are the problem. Something hidden in the jungle, something invisible to the naked eye, something not of this earth is the problem. As Dutch and his men head back to transport, they are slowly targeted one by one. Utilizing the most powerful game engine to date - CryEngine 2, will make it an unforgettable journey to the pure Predator universe. Predator - THOTJ is a quick sketch mod, sort of a concept, of how a Predator game on a modern game engine would look like. You will take the role of commando and 3 freely choosable comrades to help you out on the mission. The mod will feature three game modes which will make it a more enjoyable experience.

PREDATOR - THE HEAT OF THE JUNGLE v0.3 mod for CRYSIS [SINGLEPLAYER]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Features: true to Predator 1987 movie, food system, new sounds, modified menu, modified hud,
easter eggs, music, hassle free installer, 3 game modes, removed nanosuit and more.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Current version: 0.3 alpha
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirements: This mod requires CRYSIS patched to version 1.2. Other versions than that are not
supported. This mod is not compatible with Crysis Warhead/Wars or demo versions. Multiplayer is
not supported. Devmode and cheats are not supported. This mod is not supported in the
combination with other mods.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bugs: not many
